Under the proposed partnership, Nokia will adopt Windows Phone as its "principle smartphone strategy" and contribute its expertise on hardware design and language support to bring the software platform to a larger range of price points, market segments and geographies. Nokia's Chief Executive Stephen Elop said that "Nokia and Microsoft will combine our strengths to deliver an ecosystem with unrivalled global reach and scale. It's now a three-horse race." . Labour MPs have been relentlessly pursuing the case and will regard Mr Andy Coulson 's departure as a major success, but it will not stop their pursuit of News International. Mr Ed Miliband said: The cloud of allegations surrounding Andy Coulson 's tenure at the News of the World raised real questions about his ability to be at the heart of the Downing Street machine. "I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgment about hanging on to him as long as he did.
